short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTRequirementAZ Panel (8620-aa-AZ) complete with:One (1) Zenith Hatch with Vent & Cover Assembly (PN:8620-29);Two (2) sets of Exterior Anchor Points, 4 total (PN: 1676-1-2); andACWL panel modification to mount ACWL-C4 Composite ACWL with Lightning Rod & Maintenance pulley assembly (PLACWL-C4)Base Panels (PN: 8545-R-116C2CXBV) complete with base vent assembly (PN:1594-24-1) in each panelMain Panel, ‘B‘ type (8545-R-109-B)Qty 1 AZ Panel, Qty 2 Base Panel and Qty 1Main Panel to be delivered to Barrington, Nova Scotia.And only qty 1 Main Panel, ‘B‘ type to be delivered to Holberg, British Columbia.
